title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package for Ollama models; drop-in LLM & embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like); folders, prompts, models manager.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go; chat, manage models, syntax highlight.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama; idiomatic client with streaming support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for CPU/GPU deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Cookbook repo: build ChatGPT-like apps in Python using Chainlit + Ollama.

title: ollama-camouflage
summary: Lightweight proxy that adds OpenAI-compatible endpoints to Ollama for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-rag-qa
summary: End-to-end RAG question-answering demo with Ollama, LangChain & Chroma.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin to summarize notes or generate text using Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot server (Bolt.js) that streams Ollama replies into threads.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Active community discussion & PoC for native Hugging Face transformers integration with Ollama.
